p: The literature search was performed by querying PubMed, Web of Science, and Scopus databases to retrieve all papers (“primary sources of information”) that could be included in the process of identification, screening, and final eligibility. Additional papers were found by manual searching or by screening the primary sources of information. The platforms were queried by means of Boolean operators, including the search terms (African swine fever OR ASF virus) AND (epidemiology OR spatial pattern * OR temporal pattern * OR trend * OR “control measures” OR control * OR eradication *).
